parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Teams

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Add given member to given team. Effect is local, unless both member and team are local to PC on which command is executed, then effect is global.

<br><br> The same [[Team Member]] can be member of several different [[teams]] at the same time.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> team '''addTeamMember''' member

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> team: [[Team Member]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> member: [[Team Member]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_team [[addTeamMember]] _teamMember;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[createTeam]], [[deleteTeam]], [[forEachMemberTeam]], [[removeTeamMember]], [[teamMember]], [[teamName]], [[teams]], [[teamType]], [[forEachMember]], [[forEachMemberAgent]]
</value></part></template>
